#!/bin/bash -e -x
MANUSCRIPT=imx-4.14.98-2.0.0_ga.xml
GITSERVER="10.20.30.20" chmod 0600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa ssh-keyscan ${GITSERVER} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
# initialize technexion github yocto repository echo ===== Repo init yocto from TechNexion github ===== ${HOME}/bin/repo init -u ssh://rdsw@${GITSERVER}/volume1/internal_git/edm/edm-yocto-bsp.git -b sumo-4.14.y_GA-internal -m $MANUSCRIPT
sed -e "s,sumo_4.14.98-2.0.0_GA-wip,refs/tags/tn-sumo_4.14.98-2.0.0_GA_20191007.1_rc1,g" -i .repo/manifest.xml cat .repo/manifest.xml
echo ===== Repo sync yocto from TechNexion github ===== ${HOME}/bin/repo sync --force-sync
# Update EULA Agreement Acceptance Config and Create the setup-envronment scripts echo ===== Update EULA Agreement Acceptance Config and Create the setup-envronment scripts ===== sed -i ':a;N;$!ba;s/EULA_ACCEPTED=\n/echo "ACCEPT_FSL_EULA = \\"1\\"" >> conf\/local.conf\n/' sources/base/setup-environment

#!/bin/bash -x
DLDIR=/home/jenkins/data/src/yocto2.5/download SSTATEDIR=/home/jenkins/data/src/yocto2.5/sstat
SOMs=("axon-imx6" "pico-imx6" "pico-imx7" "pico-imx8mq" "pico-imx8mm" "edm-imx8mq" "flex-imx8mm" "axon-imx8mm") DISTROs=("xwayland") # "x11") # "fb" "wayland") TGTIMGTYPEs=("tn-image-test" "fsl-image-qt5-validation-imx") # "fsl-image-validation-imx") "core-image-minimal" "core-image-base" "core-image-sato" "fsl-image-machine-test")
# setup environment variables for building # BASEBOARDs=("pi" "nymph" "dwarf" "hobbit") # DISPLAYs=("lvds7" "hdmi720p" "hdmi1080p" "lcd" "lvds7_hdmi720p") # WLANs=("qca" "brcm" "ath-pci") setup_env_vars () { case $1 in pico-imx8mq) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" panel="ili9881c" ;; pico-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" panel="ili9881c" ;; edm-imx8mq) board="wizard" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" panel="ili9881c" ;; flex-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" panel="ili9881c" ;; axon-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" panel="ili9881c" ;; pico-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; pico-imx7) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; pico-imx6ul) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; edm-imx6) board="fairy" disp="lvds7" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; axon-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; edm-imx7) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; tep1-imx7) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" panel="" ;; tep1-imx6ul) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" panel="" ;; tek-imx6) board="tek" disp="lvds10" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" panel="" ;; tek3-imx6ul) board="tek" disp="lvds10" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" panel="" ;; *) ;; esac }
# Loop each som distro image_type and configs for som in ${SOMs[*]}; do for distro in ${DISTROs[*]}; do # building the yocto with preset config params echo "===== Building SOM:$som DISTRO:fsl-imx-$distro TARGET:$target ====="
# go to workspace for next build cd ${WORKSPACE}
# Set up the build environment variables setup_env_vars $som echo "===== WLAN:$wlan DISPLAY:$disp BASEBOARD:$board PANEL:$panel ====="
# setup yocto build environment MACHINE=$som DISTRO=fsl-imx-$distro WIFI_FIRMWARE=y WIFI_MODULE=$wlan DISPLAY=$disp BASEBOARD=$board PANEL=$panel source edm-setup-release.sh -b build-$som
# get current build dir and check if local.conf exists BUILD_DIR=. if [ ! -e $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf ]; then echo -e "\n ERROR - No build directory is set yet. Run the 'setup-environment' script before running this script to create " $BUILD_DIR echo -e "\n" return 1 else # set the download directory [ -d ${DLDIR} ] || mkdir -p ${DLDIR} [ -d ${SSTATEDIR} ] || mkdir -p ${SSTATEDIR} # setup conf/local.conf if grep "^DL_DIR.*" $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^DL_DIR.*|DL_DIR = "'$DLDIR'"|g' -i $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf else echo "DL_DIR = \"$DLDIR\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf fi if grep "^SSTATE_DIR.*" $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^SSTATE_DIR.*|SSTATE_DIR = "'$SSTATEDIR'"|g' -i $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf else echo "SSTATE_DIR = \"$SSTATEDIR\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf fi cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/bblayers.conf fi
# copy the site.conf from ${workspace} for internal git fetch cp $WORKSPACE/site.conf $BUILD_DIR/conf/site.conf cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/site.conf export
# build both fsl-image-validation-imx, fsl-image-qt5-validation-imx images for target in ${TGTIMGTYPEs[*]}; do # Compile using bitbake bitbake $target done done done
